headline.main: ISOLATIONISTS SEEN IN 'MORAL CONFUSION'; Union of Democratic Action Condemns Pacifists Here

lead_paragraph: Isolationists and pacifists in this country today represent the "same intellectual and moral confusion that played so tragic a role in the collapse of European democracies," Dr. James Loeb Jr., executive secretary of the Union for Democratic Action, declared yesterday in a statement made public at the Union's headquarters, 202 West Fortieth Street.
abstract: Union for Dem Action condemns isolationists and pacifists in reply to cong
